version 1.1.0
=============

*Date:* 12-Aug-2014

- added `inArray` helper method - much faster than the inbuilt PHP `in_array` method
- updated documentation for newer methods
- PSR4 alias change

=============

*Date:* 01-Mar-2014

Initial release
